class.name: godel_plugins/RobotBlendingPanel
class.description: A panel widget that can be used in an rviz instance for surface blending path generation

class.name: godel_plugins/RobotBlendingPlugin
class.description: A GUI plugin to create and run robot paths for blending surfaces.

qtgui.label: Robot Blending
qtgui.statustip: A GUI plugin for generating robot paths for surface blending
